title: Wheel of Destiny Returns!
itunes:title: Wheel of Destiny Returns!
description:
A room filled with heroes – Dan Hanzus, Colleen Wolfe, Chris Wesseling & Gregg Rosenthal – recap all the latest news from around the NFL including Vikings head coach Mike Zimmer taking time away from the team to undergo eye surgery, and the league announcing that Darrelle Revis will not face discipline for his February arrest. Then, the heroes revisit the “Wheel of Destiny” (much to Gregg’s chagrin) as Wess attempts to defend his title.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
